modName: Disable Ranged and Magic Kill Cams
summary: Disables the kill cam for ranged and magic attacks.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: This only works on the new ranged/magic killcam.  Better modders than me are making mods to disable the melee killcam.

The recent patch added kill cams to ranged and magic combat.  Since I attack almost exclusively at range, the lack of a \"disable kill cam\" option in the game settings never bothered me before.

I found another mod to disable the kill cam (\"No Kill Moves\"), but at that time it didn\'t work with the ranged/magic killcams in this version of the game.  This is important enough to me that I fired up the Creation Kit and made my first mod.

To install, put the NoKillCam.esp file in your skyrim/Data/ directory.
author: Wil Langford
